name: Escape room:Riddles,Brain test
description:
Try the most entertaining brain challenge with 100 doors to open!

Are you absolutely sure you can solve all the puzzles and crack all the codes to escape 100 rooms? Only a few have managed to do so. So, if you think you have what it takes, open this amazing brain challenge and prove us wrong! Fun escape room game with lots of brain teasers and tricky riddles will entertain you for hours.

Each room is unique and has a specific task that you have to complete in order to open the door and move to the next room. Think, observe, guess, connect clues until you crack the code!

FEATURES:
- 500+ challenging levels and a lot more to come!
- Large variety of fun brain puzzles and tricky riddles!
- Hints are available if you need them, but we are sure you won't!
- Enjoy amazing graphics and animations!
- Set your own pace – play without timer and with no pressure at all!
- All levels are FREE!

Start the Escape Room challenge, boost your brainpower and become a master of escape!
